EmailTemplate.name: NGA Emails.07-22-21 RET Freshop Community Meeting Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Freshop at NGA
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’ve been virtual for so long and are thrilled to finally see you in person! To debut our partnership with NCR, we’ve secured a booth at NGA to showcase our proven, highly scalable, API-based eCommerce platform. You can look forward to hearing from our industry-leaders as they demonstrate our new, innovative product features and more that NCR has to offer. We hope to see you there! ${CTAText3} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> ${CTA2Text4} <[[${CTA2URL}?${url-parameter}]]> Nick Arlt NCR Freshop Business Ops Sir. Dir. Rebekah Raudebaugh NCR Freshop Product Marketer <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
